website_summaries.verdict: The best budget coat rack available. Looks good in a variety of rooms. Small and narrow for more confined wall spaces.
pros: Simple design makes it easy to mount and use on any wall
Good spacing between the hooks for multiple coats at the same time
cons: Heavier coats can slide off the straight hooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for hanging shoes! With multiple boys his is a huge help with keeping organized. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: rebekah gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but need one small adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to go under a floating shelf for cute storage in my hallway/living area. It's exactly what I needed at a low price point and easy to install. The only downside is that the pegs are super slippery, so coats have a problem staying on. It's an easy fix though; head to home depot (or Amazon) and spend $4 on white or clear non slip stickers for the bathtub. Cut them up and stick them around the pegs. Voila, problem solved. All my coats stay on now.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Digs

customer_reviews.title: Good for lightweight jackets
customer_reviews.text: What I mean by the title is this. The spacing of the pegs are too close together, and they don't taper or anything on the ends. Therefore, if you try to put heavy/thick coats on this rack, they seem to push each other off. Many times when I come home, I find a jacket or two on the floor. The way to prevent this is to put jackets on every other peg which kind of defeats the purpose of having a rack with this many pegs. My suggestion is if you’re planning on using this for winter coats, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wall hanging shoe rack!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I love this thing! I actually used it as a wall hanging shoe rack in our closet! I was looking for something that was substantial enough to hold mens size 12 shoes, but also something that wasn't very bulky. This is perfect. I ordered 2 to get an even number of pegs. This holds our shoes plush to the wall, and is an awesome use of space. I would say that this is nice looking, good quality, and EASY to install. I did this in about 5 minutes by myself and I am not a handy woman!
customer_reviews.author: MBHE

customer_reviews.title: I love these for displaying my marathon and race medals
customer_reviews.text: I love these for displaying my marathon and race medals. I've had it for three years no problems. Easy to install with the little screw caps to cover the screw head. Never chipped or scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly constructed, cheap material
customer_reviews.text: There were two pegs detached from the rack, one missing a screw altogether. This item could easily be built for less than $5.00. I will be keeping it for a hat rack, as I do not want to hassle with the return. It wouldn't support much more weight than a light jacket. Please keep shopping for something better or build it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Broken on delivery
customer_reviews.text: I live in a house with very limited storage, and thought these would help for hanging things in each of my 3 bedrooms, so I bought 3. The bamboo is just as pretty as the pictures, and installing them was just as easy as hanging anything on plaster walls, but 2 of the 3 came with 1 of pegs broken - split wood. I managed to repair them with wood glue, but I'm really dissapointed. They were inexpensive, so I didn't expect luxurious quality, but I did expect them to be intact. I probably would've sent them back, but the shipping would've cost most than the items.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging resistance bands
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I needed it for. During quarantine I turned my basement into a home gym and I really did want clutter. I bought this to hang resistance bands from and it is perfect for that. I took off one star because one hook is loose, but I noticed after I hung it and didn’t feel like going through the exchange process.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh213

customer_reviews.title: Stripped screw immediately
customer_reviews.text: One of the hooks installed fine (needed anchors), but the second one was much more difficult. The screws stripped almost instantly and I couldn't fully screw into my wall and couldn't get the screw out of the hooks to attempt to use another similar sized screw. Really disappointed since I was only to install one out of the two.
customer_reviews.author: Porter C

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: slightly warped but able to flatten them against the wall. just worried this will ultimately make them pull away from them all quicker than they would have if the wood was flat. very thin and lightweight, really can't hang anything heavy on it. Nice finished look with the little plugs to cover the screws though!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Multi use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used this to put shoes on and I love it! I needed something to help me save space and increase storage and this is perfect! I ordered two and I’m going to purchase more. Multi use and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, I love it but not for hanging mugs.
customer_reviews.text: This rack delivered better quality than I expected for the price. I am using them to hang coffee mugs under the cabinet. I wish I hadn't bought these for this purpose though because the ends aren't as wide as I'd like to prevent cups from being able to slide off when being accidently bumped. If I end up breaking mugs I'll use it in my bedroom for clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value and functionality
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine. I wish they had holes that were spaced well enough to just put into the studs. It’s sleek and works with most decor. I used mine in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Dannygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, looks good. When using for a hat rack they don't stack and stay as well as I had hoped but work with a little patience
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding Purses!
customer_reviews.text: I installed three of these on one wall in my closet. I hung purses up and it looks great! Organized, clean lines and sturdy. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Hank Charleston

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of wood, but didn't fit my application
customer_reviews.text: I've done a lot of woodworking, and I found this item well-made, and well-finished. Perhaps they've improved it since some of the earlier negative reviews. But it didn't fit my application, which was to make hangers for my trumpet and cornet.
customer_reviews.author: SiteReader

customer_reviews.title: Everything slips off of the pegs
customer_reviews.text: If the pegs were shaped like traditional Shaker pegs this would be perfect. This is well constructed enough and the price is right, however the shape of the pegs does not give a good purchase for items to hang on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good rack for my home gym
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rack to hang resistance bands in my home gym. Works perfect for what I needed. Quality is good and it looks good too. A successful purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Love it, has lasted for years, but things do slide off a little.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for years, and it continues to hold up. Looks beautiful. Only issue is that since the hooks aren't angled up at all (they are parallel to the ground), things slide off of them somewhat easily.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Missing a hole for installation. Missing details. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The item seems solid and durable. However, mine only came with one hole for installation, yet it provided me with two wooden plugs, along with two screws. In addition, the rack is chipped in five different places and some spots are missing paint. I ordered the black one, so maybe others have better luck with the other options. I will be returning this product as I do not think it is worth more than $10.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works, just watch weight and pressure on it. We used ours for shoe storage. One is still intact, the other came out of the plaster wall.
customer_reviews.author: amanda zanger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 but only needed one. Looks great easy to put up. Returned other today to USPS unopened.
customer_reviews.author: beverly belote

customer_reviews.title: Shabby chic at best
customer_reviews.text: Small knicks in multiple places, wood exposed. I'll have to repainted before mounting. Had MUCH better luck with the chrome hooks from Liberty for just a dollar more.
customer_reviews.author: GSR

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo YES!  Shaker pegs NO!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it's made of bamboo for the decreased environmental impact, but unfortunately the shaker pegs really do not hold coats very well. Also, the drywall anchors it comes with really don't hold up very well. You'll need to find a stud or get some more heavy duty anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Green

customer_reviews.title: Pegs are small
customer_reviews.text: The pegs are smaller than they appear. It'll do, but just barely.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very subtle, sturdy, and easy to install. I collect loungefly backpacks and this product is what I use to display my beauties. I also got one for my siblings with very heavy backpacks
customer_reviews.author: Bryana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to install and to use, but arrived with some of the white paint chipped off. You can tell these are on the cheaper end.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this rack
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased this simple hook. The design is simple and yet everything I needed. With its many hooks, it holds purses, jackets, and more with ease. Hardware included made it super easy to install.I like that the design is basic, but the appearance is attractive enough to be in a highly frequented area.
customer_reviews.author: Erica E

customer_reviews.title: I could have built a better coat rack with a few bucks of wood at ...
customer_reviews.text: The pegs aren't really long enough and it's not sloped upwards so coats kind of just fall off of it immediately. I fixed it by putting screws near the tips to keep the coats from falling off but...I could have built a better coat rack with a few bucks of wood at home depot. Not really worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanConsumerX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kids room!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my daughter's room. She hangs up lots of sweaters, coats, and bags on it and they have all stayed on. I thought that I would have a problem with things sliding off but the pegs are long enough that we haven't had that problem so far!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: WHITE SEVEN PEGS
customer_reviews.text: I FOUND A WOOD RACK THAT YOU CAN DO SO MUCH WITH, WHEN I BOUGHT I IT WAS ON SALE OR CLARENCE WHEN IT CAME MY HUSBANB, MY HUSBAND SAID NOW WHAT THE H--- ARE DOING WITH THAT SO IT WAS MINE, I WAS GOING TO USE IT FOR HIS BELTS I HAD ALREADY GOTTEN ONE FOR TIES WORKS GREAT S NOW I HAVE IT FOR MY SCAF COLLECTION HOLDS 60 SCARFS GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: ROSEMARIE

customer_reviews.title: Safer hooks for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because our old backpack/jacket rack had curved metal hooks, and being at a level at which my rowdy children could easily access it was giving me nightmares of impaled heads. This solved my mommy-anxiety, and it's attractive to boot. We're a couple weeks in and so far it's done the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Wobbly Paper Sonata

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our walls and is very sturdy. It is well made! I will warn you that it does not have a nob at the end. So if you're planning on using this in an area where it will get bumped a lot you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tcamer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a nice little coat rack. I do wish there were little buttons at the end of the pegs so our coats wouldn't keep slipping off, but is an easy alter. Very strong for only having the two screws. I was very surprised.
customer_reviews.author: iansgirlri

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Pieces broken off of it when we opened the package. Second time this has happened. Either product poorly made or too fragile for the shipping. In any case, broken upon delivery. Returned right away.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCourt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - except I bought the certified used ...
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Easy to install - except I bought the certified used version through Amazon and there was an anchor missing from my package.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our use
customer_reviews.text: The mollies that came with this were a bit flimsy, but other than that, it works for us. We use it to hang play silks, so I can't really comment on the durability for heavy items. But, it's been hanging in our play room for well over three weeks now, keeping life slightly more orderly than before, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: luckynumber9

customer_reviews.title: Simple, attractive, and does the job for a low price,,
customer_reviews.text: Does what I needed it for,, Would hold clothes or coats better if the pegs were angled upwards. I used toggle bolts not the included hardware to ensure a solid wall mount. Appears durable and the "hole plugs" added a finished look. My use is light duty for temporary use.
customer_reviews.author: JWhite

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and hadnt gotten it out and hung yet! When i opened the box, it was broke and it was too late to return. Now i have a broken one i cant use or return. :(
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids room
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of this rack. It was a great add on to my daughter’s room!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than I expected and we had to add an ...
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than I expected and we had to add an extra screw into a stud b/c with jackets and sweaters, came away from the wall. However, style is sleek and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: V dysinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang and it's managed to hold up 3 kids backpacks for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Golden

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Dice design and easy to instal but the paint job was pretty bad and thin.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Hardware was missing. No invoice or anything in the box. It appears that the product was thrown in the box. Product has rub marks on the end where the paint is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured. I'm using my 4 white racks ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. I'm using my 4 white racks for scarves and belts. By mounting them diagonally, I've made a scarf "rainbow" effect.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, the only thing I would improve is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice item, the only thing I would improve is I would make the pegs angled so things don't fall off of it. One rung was a little loose but we just put some crazy glue in the hole and it's totally fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M. Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Got the product out of the box and it was broke in half. It seems to be cheaply made which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought because of the anchors they provide that it would work fine, but it's already dangling halfway out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I wanted something in my entry way that I could pile my coats onto. I thought because of the anchors they provide that it would work fine, but it's already dangling halfway out of the wall.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff!
customer_reviews.text: great hanger thingy. bought them for baseball hats and the pegs are a bit close. have to skip pegs, so only able to hang about 4 hats per rack. oh well, they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these to put in my kids' room. I use them to hold belts, hats, headbands, necklaces, etc. It really helps organize their rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Fancy But Not Cheaply-Made
customer_reviews.text: This peg rack is simple. It's wood; it's white; it's easy to install; it seems durable (my son will surely put it to that test); and it was exactly what we were looking for. If this is what you're looking for, you've found it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Item took over a week to be delivered and was cracked on arrival, also missing the two screws that fit the plastic anchors it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wu

customer_reviews.title: Needs better pegs
customer_reviews.text: While the product is great overall, the pegs are too smooth at the end so the items that are hanging slide right off.
customer_reviews.author: HDL

customer_reviews.title: Great rack
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect and looks really good. Just the right amount of space for all my junk.
customer_reviews.author: Alison G

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute, but not very strong. I bought cheaper ones that have been much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Babb Family

customer_reviews.title: Like them so well, ordering two more
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality and easy install. Used to hang necklaces from for easier selection quickly when needed. Now to get two more to hang up my scarves. Great value; good product; fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kito

customer_reviews.title: great as a shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: used this as a shoe rack in my foyer; works great at getting shoes off the floor so the floor can be cleaned! much more organized looking too
customer_reviews.author: amymcg

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price I give it 5 stars. It's a nice rack and worth the money. I put it up in the kids' playroom to hang their clothes, bags, etc. It's handy and keep things more organized. I can easiy use it some other places in the house too. I am thining about buying another one in the bedroom to hang some stuff as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. CHAN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this on the wall to hang our shoes on. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We decided to return this wall mount because of the closeness of the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for organization in closets!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. These hook racks were perfect for hanging all my belts on the wall in my closet. They worked so well I bought several of them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what this is designed to hold but it is way too small to hold seven hats even though it has seven pegs.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, incredibly easy to install, minimal tools required. Installation hardware (2 screws and 2 wall anchors) is included--all one needs is a drill, level and a phillips head screw driver. My wife wanted something to hang scarves and this fills the bill. The pegs are spaced very well and the length of the pegs accomodates bulkier items easily. It is not often that simple items exceed my expectations, but this product does!
customer_reviews.author: M. Urioste

customer_reviews.title: Did not look like it could handle heavy weight so I returned it
customer_reviews.text: Seemed flimsy. Did not look like it could handle heavy weight so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: manythingstosell

customer_reviews.title: I liked it-Nice item
customer_reviews.text: Got these today, and the quality is good, but one peg needed to be reglued (popped out when were were about to hang). Item came with anchors/screws, and stoppers to cover screw so you can't tell were it was hung. Looks great. Would buy again. Fast, smooth transaction, great seller. Item looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well made
customer_reviews.text: This peg rack is nicely shaped and well finished. The pegs are screwed in (as well glued apparently) so it should be plenty tough. It comes with screws and plugs to cover the holes.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is not wood. The paint is scratched revealing plastic dowels
customer_reviews.author: rose simon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Two of the hooks broke in the first two days... from just holding up standard sized IKEA towels.
customer_reviews.author: lda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect answer to organizing my kids coats and backpacks in our laundry room!!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and holds a good amount of weight, but...
customer_reviews.text: The ends of the pegs are not designed well to keep items from slidng off the end. But if you have something with straps to hang them by then it works great. But hanging coats by their collar/shoulder area...forget it!
customer_reviews.author: firedad103

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made good value, I should have ordered. Two, natural wood look complete hardware package included
customer_reviews.author: Michael Link

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that reason
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the garage to hang up wet raincoats. Perfect for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: rxer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect addition to my daughters room to hang her princess dresses on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I hung two of these in my daughter's bedroom. They are perfect! They are pure white - sometimes a product says white but is really off-white. The paint job is great, very sturdy. I could easily pass these off as being purchased at a high end store. If you are looking for a pure white peg rack, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Bow rack.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack to hand my traditional archery bows. It works great. It fits 4 bows comfortable. (Every other dowel.)
customer_reviews.author: Sticky

customer_reviews.title: not designed well
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack is designed poorly. The pegs stick straight out from the wall instead of angling up, so coats slide to the end of the pegs which 1) reduces the number of coats you can hang on them and 2) constantly gives you the feeling that the coats will slip off the end. After 2 months of usage, this rack is pulling away from the wall and I'll be replacing it with another coat rack soon.
customer_reviews.author: marathonn

customer_reviews.title: great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Nice dainty coat hanger for small entryways, sturdy and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: cute! works well and adorable. make sure to screw into studs. mine fell b/c i did't. user error!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, peg spacing is bad
customer_reviews.text: We use it for hats, the pegs work if you hang hats on every other hook. Quality is good, peg spacing is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Rawbyn

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy & generic enough to go with modern or antique ...
customer_reviews.text: Fairly sturdy & generic enough to go with modern or antique décor. Holds 4 adult sweatshirts & a diaper bag well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and nice-looking!
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made with nice attention to detail, e.g., screw covers. It was straight-forward to install, and the pegs are well-designed for both appearance and function and spaced perfectly to accommodate hanging a variety of items from scarves to bath towels. Happy I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Good product, needs better hardware though
customer_reviews.text: All pegs were very solid, and paint was good. I would give this 5 stars if the wall anchors had a flange to keep them from just falling into the wall. We had to buy better wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Sploxy

customer_reviews.title: the rack itself is nice looking. However
customer_reviews.text: the rack itself is nice looking. However, the pegs are not long enough and too close together. Too small for coats and larger bags to fit on the rack. The pegs taper at end so coats, bags, etc fall off. would be good for windbreakers, purses, and smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: jaydub1229

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, well constructed, pegs are long enough to hold just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Gungo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not super sturdy. If you hang something really heavy you may break a peck. But its a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, looks great. I also bought the matching bench/shoe rack. All good quality, easy to assemble. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: A. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: nice looking item
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat rack, but wish it really had come with the mounting hardware and matching wood plugs. It did not. We will need to search for our own, which is a pain. Otherwise it is a nice looking hat rack and what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: A very nice reasonable coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my wall, holds coats and hats well. The pegs are slightly flared at the end, no knobs.
customer_reviews.author: BKW

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great rack for the money so far. I ordered 4 to hang a bunch of my hats and helmets (snowboard, ski, motocross) and it all looks great on my wall. The bamboo is a nice look and they are sturdy. I found that each rack is slightly different sized by about 1-2cm in length but it's not an issue and not noticeable when looking at them arranged in a vertical array on my wall each a foot spaced apart. One of the four racks I ordered did not come with screws which was frustrating but Amazon gave me a partial refund which was fine. Other than the screws from the one rack, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Breauxstantine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for belts! Hung on back of my closet door. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Loni Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wood split in the back and fell off the wall
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schuller

customer_reviews.title: A win/win/win situation!
customer_reviews.text: It's bamboo, so it's good for the environment. It's great for hanging lei's and necklaces and easy organization. It's cheaper than making it myself and it's stable and easy to mount. Win/win/win!
customer_reviews.author: manapualabs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Utility Item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for its intended purpose. Simple and attractive. Very easy to install. Works with most any decor. Sturdy. We're happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PSP Lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice and neat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our back door. Nice and neat!
customer_reviews.author: Super DAD

customer_reviews.title: A great organizing tool
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy enough to support 20 of my family's coats and streamlined enough to keep our decor modern and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: This item has worked very well for me. I am using it in the garage, just outside my laundry/mud room, to hang mops and brooms. It certainly is nice enough looking to use inside the house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came on time brand new with hardware I'm super pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small and not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would serve to handle jackets or towels. This isn't suited for that. A few of the pegs have already come out. The picture should hang some items on it, so you can get a feel for the relative size.
customer_reviews.author: David A Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of this rack for the price. It's very sturdy & I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: they slide off
customer_reviews.text: don't like how the jackets and sweaters slide off of this item. They don't hold them right. You want one get with hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Andrews

product_meta.title: Spectrum Diversified Wood Wall Hook Rack, 7 Peg, Bamboo
product_meta.description:
Color:BambooThis 7-Peg Wood Rack by Spectrum are a great additions to any entryway, mudroom or closet. This rack is perfect for hanging coats, umbrellas, towels or robes in a bathroom. Hardware and wood screw head covers are included. Measures 3.75"L x 24"W X 1.75"H. 

Spectrum products incorporate original designs created by and for the exclusive use of Spectrum. Most of Spectrum’s products are protected by intellectual property rights including issued design patents and pending design patent applications. Protection for certain products may be provided and/or augmented by other federal and state proprietary rights including trademark, trade dress and copyright rights in the appearance and design of the products.
feature_bullets: Hang and store your hats, coats, purses and more
Easily mounts to walls with included hardware

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
